entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 6, Minimal API - Endpoint does not appear in swagger-output if Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http parameter exists in "MapXXX" #39766
  • Use vdir environment variable when injecting browser refresh script #39762
  • Security schemes cannot be generated for individual endpoints/actions #39761
    7.0-preview2
  • Test failure - "DefaultReconnectionHandler.test - invokes update on each attempt" #39758
  • Inferring `FromServices` optionality based on nullability information #39757
    7.0-preview2
  • Telemetry for EnableInsecureAbsoluteFormHostOverride #39756
    6.0.x
  • Inferring `FromBody.AllowEmptyBehavior = Allow` based nullability information #39754
    7.0-preview2
  • Ability to use DiagnosticSource in Kestrel without the rest of ASP.NET Core #39744
  • Blazor server renders twice resulting in static HTML animation showing twice #39740
    Backlog

Closed

  • OpenAPI analyzers for Problem Details #39750
  • Nested TagHelpers that share HTML names can cause the SyntaxTree to be of incorrect length #39764
  • [SignalR] retryContext in withAutomaticReconnect to expose more http context #37439
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SignalR C# Client StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected #39626
    7.0-preview2
  • ApiExplorer not handling multiple routes on same action method correctly #26234
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Automatic type inference won't work when an EventCallBack<T> is added #39734
  • [Component Vulnerability]please consider to upgrade node-fetch in @microsoft/signalr from @^2.x.x to @^3.1.1 #39672
    7.0-preview2
  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38878
  • Generic Blazor component can't correctly infer it's type when type has an additional constraint #25588
    7.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] CascadingTypeParameter problem #38479
    7.0-preview2
  • partial tag helper content not rendered in asp.net core 6 hosted in IIS 10 #38541
    Discussions
  • [Consumes] and CORS together doesn't work without a spooky workaround #4887
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SDK Blazor Hot Reload Test Failure `Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings_WhenUsingProjectOption` #39657
    7.0-preview1
  • Can't get SignalR to work behind AWS ALB #39736

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Web.JS Jest Tests #39763
    area-blazor
  • Fix: HttpMethodMatcherPolicy.ApplyAsync ArgumentNullException #39759
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add readonly to record struct #39755
    area-runtime
  • define RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Bump node-fetch from 2.6.5 to 2.6.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #39751
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Use IndexOfAny(char, char) with Span #39743
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-routing, community-contribution
  • Allow pdb delta to be optionally included in a hot reload payload #39742
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.3

Merged

  • Move some targets into a Directory.Build.targets file #39712
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • .ConfigureAwait(false) in SignalR client libraries #39728
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview2
  • Removing from API Description parameters when inferred (FromPath) and not in the route #39607
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update node-fetch to 2.6.7 #39741
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Refactor (Web.JS) : Follow up fixes #39748
    area-blazor, auto-merge, community-contribution
  • Added more stream result types #39709
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Bump log4js from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39686
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [release/5.0] Improve File access issues #39732
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39680
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39733
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Do not assume that `this._settings.loginMode` is not `undefined`. #35245
    area-blazor
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES machines for official builds #39683
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Always build App.Ref and the targeting packs #39620
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.3
